content.description: This route climbs a cool left-angling seam. Pretty relentless flowing movement on a variety of small crimps/edges. Technical and balancy. Starts out less than vertical but gradually steepens towards the chains. Don't miss the "hidden" foothold at the top! A fun little gem of a route; if it were even 15ft taller, it would be a classic!
content.location: In Nipple Stimulation Alcove-- just right of the East Side Via Ferrata. Gypsy Girl, Silver Lisp, and Nipple Stimulation are also to the left of Slot Machine. Hard On and Direct Hard On, two trad lines, are around the corner to the right.

content.description: Defined crux in the middle of the wall
content.location: Next bolted line on climbers right of Nipple Stimulation

content.description: Chimney start, plug pro, then pull out of the chimney and into the dihedral. The second roof is easier, but pro is sparse/tricky throughout.
content.protection: Standard rack with slings for chickenheads. Weeping, sappy, tree anchor.
content.location: The dihedral left of the four sport routes.
About 50 feet right of Tool Buttress gulley.

content.description:
Start at the base of the left angling crack on the right side of the roof/overhang.   

  Climb up into the crack and traverse up and right with the crux getting to the first bolt. Plug more gear in the traversing crack, then shoot straight up the blunt arete clipping one more bolt before the anchors.
content.protection: Standard rack with long runners to mitigate rope drag. Bolted anchors.
content.location: On the far right of the wall to the right of Nipple Stimulation. Starts at the right end of the big roof.

content.description: Technical climbing on a short face
content.location: Just left of the via ferrarta chimney

content.description: Start at the base of the left-angling crack that starts at the far right end of the large roof. Share the star with Hard-On, but continue straight up the shallow dihedral.
content.protection: Standard rack. The tree on top is about 20 feet back from the edge.
content.location: Same start as Hard-On. Can use Hard-On's anchors to rap.

content.description: To the right of tool butress.
